channel.title: arrangment on Honduras Street Music
channel.description: Recent content in arrangment on Honduras Street Music

item.title: Arranging Your Track For Orchestral Instruments
item.description: Bring the sound of the orchestra into your track can be intimidating. You can hear that soaring violin or the thrum of the cello but don’t know how to parley that into a coherent element of your song. Read on for some tips from professional players and arrangers! Gallery / Unsplash In omni enim arte vel studio vel quavis scientia velas in ipsa virtute optimum quidque est. Quod est, ut dixi, habere ea, quae secundum naturam sint, vel omnia vel plurima et maxima.

item.title: Interview - Finding The Right Drums For Your Song
item.description: Drumming sits at the intersection of art and science. Your genre dictates certain sounds, but how do you get that magical ‘it’ factor that a truly inspirational rhythm part can bring? HSM sits down with drummer and producer XXXXXX to discuss how to approach this all important part of your track. Gallery / Unsplash In omni enim arte vel studio vel quavis scientia velas in ipsa virtute optimum quidque est. Quod est, ut dixi, habere ea, quae secundum naturam sint, vel omnia vel plurima et maxima.
